content.question: Which of the following best represents the author's intended audience?

choices.label: Individuals who are fairly well acquainted with Carlyle's writing
Writers who hope to produce books that are like Carlyle's
Instructors looking for different ways to teach Carlyle
Scholars seeking information about Carlyle's personal life

content.answer: Individuals who are fairly well acquainted with Carlyle's writing

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
